# JwtTokenBuilder.AddHeader method

Adds a custom header to the JWT token.

```csharp
public JwtTokenBuilder AddHeader(string k, object v)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| k | The header key. |
| v | The header value. |

## Return Value

The current [`JwtTokenBuilder`](../JwtTokenBuilder.md) instance.
